question: Can I study at your Madarasa in South Africa while I am living in the USA?Please tell me if there is a way and if there is not why don't you make a way to do that??
answer:
QUESTION
Jizaakallaah.
ANSWER


Share:
Unfortunately, our resources do not allow us to run a correspondence course.

Also, the nature of Islamic knowledge is such that it is impractical to cover a complete course via correspondence, e.g. Tajweed (the art of pronunciation) cannot be taught via correspondence.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Moulana Imraan Vawda
FATWA DEPT.
